notes.text: Dr. Mendelev noted that this potential was developed in the same manner as 2009--Mendelev-M-I-Kramer-M-J-Ott-R-T-et-al--Cu-Zr, except that the original Cu potential was replaced by MCu31.eam.fs, which has more realistic stable and unstable stacking fault energies. This potential can be used to simulate the plastic deformation in the Cu-Zr amorphous alloys with embedded Cu particles.
